headline: Wall Street loses more steam as earnings come in ahead of US wholesale price report
summary: Wall Street's retreat from recent records continued Wednesday as markets took in more bank earnings reports while waiting for the latest data on inflation and the housing market.  Nasdaq futures were off 0.5%.  Wells Fargo dipped 1.7% after the San Francisco bank's fourth-quarter revenue fell short of Wall Street forecasts and its profit was trimmed by severance payouts.
